name: Roblox Model
summary: Learn about .RBXMX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Roblox Studio is used by programmers with different skill levels to build objects and places in Roblox, a kid-friendly environment where people of all ages can exercise their creativity. Roblox Studio supports complex scripts and game functions, manipulation of terrain or objects, and more.

description: An RBXMX files is a 3D model used by Roblox Studio, a Roblox building tool. It contains a model, which may be a vehicle, person, animal, plant, building, or another object.
